channel.title: TFS Top Tip #16 - Limit What you Build
channel.description: When you create a new build definition in Team Foundation Server, you get to define how the workspace looks for the build. By default this includes the ENTIRE team project. While this usually always works, it is nearly always not...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Henning Kilset+00:00
item.description: Thanks very much Martin - grokking Team Build might just be the hardest part of getting up to speed on TFS - and you've successfully made the wall a bit easier to climb :)
item.dc:creator: Henning Kilset

item.title: Comment by Jonathan+00:00
item.description: Great post, it was really helpful for me. Just a minor catch, under "What Variables are Allowed?" it's not "TfsBuildServer.exe.config", it is "TfsBuildService.exe.config".
item.dc:creator: Jonathan
